sentences.sContent: Particles of different kinds - including microscopic algae, other plankton and humus from surrounding land areas - are continuously deposited on lake bottoms.
sentences.sContent_eng: Particles of different kinds - including microscopic algae, other plankton and humus from surrounding land areas - are continuously deposited on lake bottoms.
sentences.sCn: 不同类型的颗粒 - 包括显微藻类，其他浮游生物和周边陆地地区的腐殖质 - 不断沉积在湖底。

sentences.sContent: Wind and spring floods erode soils, exposing underlying layers and premiering new compositions of humus and minerals on the surface.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wind and spring floods erode soils, exposing underlying layers and premiering new compositions of humus and minerals on the surface.
sentences.sCn: 风沙和水灾侵蚀着土壤，暴露出地下土层，腐殖质新成分及其表面的矿物。

trans.tranOther: Humus is the part of soil which consists of dead plants that have begun to decay
